code: import React from'react';import appData from'../app.json';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/components/_div1.scss';import fullStar from'../assets/etoilepleine.png';import emptyStar from'../assets/etoilevide.png';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Div1(){var _useParams=useParams(),id=_useParams.id;var ficheData=appData.find(function(fiche){return fiche.id===id;});if(!ficheData){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["La fiche avec l'ID ",id," n'existe pas."]});}var title=ficheData.title,location=ficheData.location,host=ficheData.host,rating=ficheData.rating,tags=ficheData.tags;var name=host.name,picture=host.picture;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"divtop",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"div1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"div1-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:location})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"div1-right",children:tags&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tags.map(function(tag,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"tag-style",children:tag},index);})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"div2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"div2-left",children:rating&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rating",children:Array.from({length:5},function(_,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"star",src:index<rating?fullStar:emptyStar,alt:index<rating?'full-star':'empty-star'},index);})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"div2-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:picture,alt:"Host"})]})]})]});}export default Div1;
